record.condition: category in $L.file="incident" or category in $L.file="request for change"
record.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">incident</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">request for change</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
record.conditionDesc: ( Category in CurrentRecord = "incident" OR Category in CurrentRecord = "request for change")
